attributes.additional_details: Every country has taken positive movements in all areas, we have come a long way from replacing old with new and this is not a part of our world, no one should be torturing animals it should be stopped, China have made no positive movements in this section and any section to be honest, they are continuing to brutally torture these animals, in the most horrific ways possible and not one human in this world agrees with this, every single human on earth hates it, and we all wants it to stop
attributes.background: Please can you stop China from hurting all these animals, no human wants this as part of our world, no human wants to see them tie up helpless animals and brutally torture them to death or cook them while they are alive please stop the cruelty they are conflicting on these animals it’s inhuman

rejection.details:
The Governemnt is not responsible for activities taking place in foreign countries.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Coordinate rigorous world effort to end live wild animal markets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307504

Urge the Chinese government to stop the annual Yulin Dog Eating Festival: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308926
